 1998-04821998-03-240,  JUS,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the AUTHORIZATIONS TO CARRY RESTRICTED FIREARMS AND CERTAIN HANDGUNS REGULATIONS which prescribe the circumstances in which the Chief Firearms Officer may issue an authorization to carry a gun, etc., such as for self-protection or to protect another individual, or when the individual needs it for the purposes of a lawful profession or occupation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0207 Publication Date: 1998-04-15
